title: New Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/30/21
itunes:title: New Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/30/21
description:
George Noory and Dr. Bart Kosko explore his research into artificial intelligence and new technology like driverless trucks and brain implants for paralyzed people, and what some of the dangers of the technology might be.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
